modName: Merge Armor Mods - TES5Edit Easy Way
summary: Tutorial how to merge simple mods like armor mods, with TES5Edit to spare some esp files.
descriptionHtml:
Tutorial how to merge Mods with TES5Edit.

No Guarantee that it works.
First of all make BackUp from all ESP files you change something.

1. Load all desired Plugins into Tes5edit. (Make sure that the mergeplugin is the last plugin in the list or creat a new one)

2. Mark you desired esp as modified.

3. Choose all entys you want to copy into the new esp and mark them.

4. Now Choose \"Copy to overwrite\" and choose the new esp.

5. Klick ok to add the esp to the other file as a master.

6. now go to the modified esp and remove the esp-master.

7. Know mark all new entrys that are copyd from the other plugin and choose \"change form id\"

8. now go the the file directory and minimize and expand the esp to lool what change you have made.

9. Now check if all form ids have been correctly changed and save.

10. disable the old plugin and enable the new plugin and have FUN ;-)

PS You can also download this info as a txt file. Please leave with an endorse.
author: mach1991

files.name: Contains the same info as the Nexus Page
